name: Predomination
description:
You are a king without control of his people - try and regain your land whilst controlling the revolutionists. 

Brings in strategy elements to an otherwise action-heavy game

Controls: 

  •  Mouse
  •  WASD
  •  Left-Shift

This was a solo entry to the GMTK Game Jam 2020

* I recommend you use the downloaded version, to minimize chances of bugs - but feel free to use the browser version as well
